Menteri Fachrul Razi: Saya Juga Pakai Celana Cingkrang
07 Nov 2019, 09:19 by Dewi Nurita, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Agama Fachrul Razi mengklarifikasi pernyataannya soal larangan cadar dan celana cingkrang dalam rapat kerja bersama Komisi VIII DPR RI di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan, pada Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Fachrul mengatakan bahwa dirinya tidak pernah melarang orang-orang memakai cadar dan celana cingkrang dalam kehidupan bermasyarakat. Bahkan, ujar Fachrul, dirinya juga kerap memakai cingkrang saat ke masjid.
"Saya kalau ke masjid juga pakai celana cingkrang, karena masjid tempat saya di Bambu Apus itu banyak tangga, susah kalau saya pakai sarung," ujar Fachrul Razi di Kompleks Parlemen, Senayan pada Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Dalam kehidupan sehari-hari, ujar Fachrul, semua orang bebas berpakaian. Namun, ujar dia, kalau aparatur sipil negara (ASN) tentu memiliki aturan yang berbeda sesuai dengan ketentuan institusi masing-masing.
"Jadi, mohon itu digarisbawahi. Saya tidak pernah melarang. Apa juga kewenangan saya melarang itu?," ujar Fachrul Razi.
Terkait cadar, ujar Fachrul, juga sama halnya. "Silakan pakai, saya tidak pernah melarang. Tapi, bagaimana keputusan instansi, itu urusan masing-masing," ujar Fachrul.

Minister Fachrul Razi: I Also Wear Cingkrang Pants
Nov 7 2019, 09:19 by Dewi Nurita, Amirullah
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Minister of Religion Fachrul Razi clarified his statement about the prohibition of veils and trousers in a joint meeting of the House of Representatives Commission VIII at the Parliament Complex, Senayan, on Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Fachrul said that he had never forbidden people from wearing veils and trousers in social life. In fact, said Fachrul, he also often uses cingkrang when he goes to the mosque.
"When I go to the mosque I also wear trousers, because the mosque where I am in Bambu Apus has a lot of stairs, it is difficult if I wear gloves," said Fachrul Razi at the Parliament Complex, Senayan on Thursday, November 7, 2019.
In everyday life, said Fachrul, everyone is free to dress. However, he said, if the state civil apparatus (ASN) would have different rules in accordance with the provisions of their respective institutions.
"So, please underline. I have never banned it. What is my authority to prohibit it ?," said Fachrul Razi.
Regarding the veil, said Fachrul, it is also the same. "Please use it, I have never banned it. But, what is the agency's decision, it's their own business," said Fachrul.
